lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance through Kiva is the most personal and effective way for me to help grass-roots entrepreneurs around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help large corporations become more efficient and profitable.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be able to and, there's more value in $25 to 'an other in need' than there is to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a university Professor interested in improving the lives of others

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.occupational_info: I and the team I supervise make sure that the computers are running properly at a trauma hospital in Seattle, Washington, USA, so that critically-ill patients get the best possible care.

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.loan_because: Because I'm a citizen of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help professionals and executives change careers quickly and easily.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: It's a meaningful and easy way to give money to people who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying Nutrition currently living in the USA.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea.

lenders.name: Wei Ying
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my small part in making a difference in the world
lenders.occupational_info: My research looks at how different groups of people understand environmental issues

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.whereabouts: North Saanich, Vancouver Island British Columbia
lenders.loan_because: I started my first business with very little money so I know how hard that can be.  These loans are a wonderful tool to help entrepreneurs get started or expand their business.
lenders.occupational_info: Gardening, travel, reading, birding, golf, volunteering.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Nadya
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people finance their business, allowing them to have more financial freedom in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a liberal arts school and am learning to work with the community, teaching sexual health to high-school-aged students.

lenders.name: Theodore
lenders.loan_because: My money is...not mine anyway
lenders.occupational_info: I work with kids

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: they would help me.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others build their businesses so that they in turn can help inspire others to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I build property portfolios for clients that deliver profitable income & a growing asset.

lenders.name: Matteo
lenders.loan_because: "It is not from the benevolence of the butcher, the brewer, or the baker, that we can expect our dinner, but from their regard to their own interest" (Adam Smith, The Wealth of Nations).

lenders.name: Antonio Fonduca
lenders.loan_because: The world needs entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: The passion that drives me is helping others pursue and achieve excellence, whether it’s an organization or an individual I can help.

lenders.name: melissa
lenders.loan_because: I find Kiva an incredibly simple, logical and constructive way to help. I also find it fun to see what ideas others have. I prefer to help women as I assume it cannot always be easy in other parts of the world to be able to borrow money as a woman.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Kiva rocks, and I'm a firm believer in the transformational power of entrepreneurship backed by microfinance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help local entrepreneurs in Australia with their marketing.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: Loaning a little money each month doesn't have much of an impact on me compared to the good it could do.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: I loan money because I'm able to do so.  I like to enable people to work and create their own way of making money.  It's even better than putting a smile on someone's face.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a liberal arts college in New England.  I work with students and I enjoy my job a lot.  The students are very confident here and often make me laugh.

lenders.name: Sondra
lenders.loan_because:
I work for a non-profit organization called The National Foundation for Teaching Entrepreneurship that helps young people in low income communities see that their dreams can be achieved through the lens of entrepreneurship. 
I loan because I believe in everyone's capacity to achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Milly
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of students (Milly, Frances, Sasha, and Jacki) working together in our Comparative Government class. Our teacher let us know about Kiva, and we think it is a great organization!

lenders.name: Anna K
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance - to help and to be helped.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a big difference. For those of us who are fortunate, it's important to share what we have.
lenders.occupational_info: My job has taken me all over the world, which has helped me to realize that the world is very small, and that our actions, however small, can affect each other.

lenders.name: The Siegfried Group
lenders.loan_because: We are part of an entrepreneurial company, and we are particularly interested in seeing the results of the funds we invest to other entrepreneurs all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: A CPA firm established in 1988, The Siegfried Group, LLP is a professional services partnership that delivers a full range of accounting and financial resource services to major public companies and other large organizations throughout the United States (including a Big Four firm). The Siegfried Group provides high-caliber, experienced accounting and financial professionals to assist with the implementation of high-priority, critical financial work. Through long-enduring relationships, the Firm helps clients extend their in-house human resources capabilities with a customized, consistently reliable resource solution.

lenders.name: TJ Middle School
lenders.loan_because: I want my students to know that they can have a positive impact on the world.  We loan because we know we can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
My name is Andrew.  I teach social studies.  My students are 7th graders who can change the world. We raised money for this idea from businesses, religious institutions, family, and the Edison community.  
I am also a University of Wisconsin graduate looking for other Badgers who support Kiva.

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupational_info: Basically, I handle money. I mostly deposit other people's money into accounts so they may gain interest on the savings they have, or I can give them money that they have in their accounts when they request to do so.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: It's our duty to try and make the world a better place than we found it.  We are also called to share our blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I process grants for faculty members doing research at a major university.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great alternative to irresponsible giving. Loaning gives responsibility. It also vitalizes local economies.
lenders.occupational_info: I build community centers that promote cross-cultural awareness, racial reconciliation and social activism.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: a little for me is so much more for someone else!
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a catalog that gets mailed to people's homes to sell products for cooking for a company called Williams-Sonoma.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I like to spread a little good fortune around.

lenders.name: Syed Ashraf
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of change for the better
lenders.occupational_info: I make television commercials.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.occupation: I work for a state Public Health Dental Program

lenders.name: Nick & Lendy
lenders.loan_because: God blesses us so that we may bless others.

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: I was amazed when I learned of this organization.  I had to be a part of helping enterprising people, who need a hand.  I am pulling for all of them.  Continued success to all of the loan recipients and all of those lending as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently seeking employment.  I just finished my Bachelor of Arts degree in Film Production (filmmaking) at Loyola Marymount University in Los Angeles.  I paid for my private university education by obtaining student loans and via university scholarships.

lenders.name: Eric Buley
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate services for families and individuals living in affordable housing.

lenders.name: Des
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.  Everyone deserves opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise my children, improve educational opportunities, and teach children.

lenders.name: Ally
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. The more you give, the mosre you get!
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from critical care nursing & clinical consulting a few years ago to become a  full time abstract artist & illustrator. My work is primarily mixed media & I utilize the color scheme of a room to pull a piece together. I also dabble in photography.

lenders.name: J Dale
lenders.loan_because: I love to give to people who have dreams to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to take ideas that work and make them happen for companies.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I can help people who want to make a better life for themselves and their families.  What great joy to have this website available to make people's lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in Human Resources for 30 years in the automotive business. I am currently working part time in the education/testing field.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I monitor all aspects of aviation safety for a regional airline.  I'm an avid gardener, reader and traveler.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Helping people start business and generate real wealth promotes both peace and worldwide economic gain.

lenders.name: Marcio
lenders.loan_because: Because I can. Because people need. Because Kiva enables it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Brazilian-American who looks Japanese but cooks Italian and has had the privilege of seeing and living different parts of the world and different levels of the economic scale. At work, I think, write and discuss with other people defining strategy for a computer company. Off work, I think, write and discuss with other people about many different subjects.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I care about people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help a large publisher distribute valuable information for doctors and medical researchers.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Kiva has provided the most efficient way to move funds from the haves of the world to those in need and I love the one to one relationship that goes with each personal story.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I want to live in a world where people encourage one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the genes involved in development, the processes that produce a whole organism from a single cell.

lenders.name: Zack
lenders.loan_because: I've had it easy in life, and it doesn't take much to make a big impact on others' lives.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: To be able to support yourself and your family is such a sense of pride and accomplishment, whether from an economically rich or poor country.  All of us deserve a chance to support ourselves and take pride in what we do.
lenders.occupational_info: We help families with parenting skills, teach computer classes, family budgeting and accessing community resources.  We also work with schools and families to improve academic achievement.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.occupational_info: I help people create the best presentation for their event!

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Nobody succeeds without a helping hand.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the government is the least willing and able to solve the problems of mankind.  It takes a village of people like me doing what little they can to make real change.
lenders.occupational_info: I make tacos.  Not Mexican tacos, the cheap American imitation kind.

lenders.name: Angelique
lenders.loan_because: I plan to donate a portion of my earnings every month.  I appreciate the opportunities I had to have an education, become a doctor, and help others.  I hope I can enable others to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an emergency medicine physician

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I just love the concept - AND I can

lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: micro-philanthopy is pragmatic and needed.

lenders.name: wim
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of direct aid thru micro (retail) projects. Futher more I admire the KIVA system being an effective webbased system to support third world projects.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a self employed retail consultant, webshop owner and chairman of the Fair Trade shop in Zeewolde.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Computers and data storage geek.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people succeed. I also have the means at this point in my life to help others.

lenders.name: Gustav
lenders.loan_because: I have long wished that something like "Kiva" existed.  Not to sound too trite,  but we ARE all citizens of the world community,  and like it or not, we will sink or swim together.  This sort of help is the kind of human interaction that will foster global understanding on a very real and personal level.  Charity/welfare is self-defeating in all but emergency cases,  as it saps initiative.  "Kiva" loans, on the other hand,  require clear planning on the part of the loan recipient,  plus a definate goal.  The recipients eventual repayment of the loan makes us all winners.  Besides,  I am a great believer in "paying it forward", and this is the perfect way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired computer systems analyst. My wife (a retired "rocket scientist")and I live in the country in the central U.S.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital is one key part of helping people out of poverty.  But government must also do its part to promote equality, fairness and shared prosperity for all within its borders.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on anti-poverty programs in the NYC government.

lenders.name: Lava
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe in microfinancing and that federal/state/local governments can only do so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a software architect, father, lover of animals (we have 30 pets), loves challenges, loves to travel and solve crossword puzzles and trying to do the right thing.

lenders.name: Harmen
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: This is a practical way to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Student, writer, and radio host

lenders.name: Sascha
lenders.loan_because: I am glad to be able to do so...

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: microcredits are the best way to help!

lenders.name: Caralee
lenders.loan_because: its needed
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Wilfrid Laurier University, and have a part-time job in a snack booth at the local hockey rink

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Paying it Forward

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Medical Students at the University of Saskatchewan raised money for a great cause.
lenders.occupational_info: The money loaned comes from 60+ hard working medical students.

lenders.name: Sheehans care
lenders.loan_because: in honor of our grandfather who taught us well.

lenders.name: Thinkhouse Design
lenders.loan_because:
KIVA is a brilliant idea!
Using a technology for its highest purpose–bringing about the best for human beings. In this case for those in need, both lenders and borrowers.
lenders.occupational_info:
We get out of bed to:
Create with great people cool solutions that effect change in individuals, communities and the world.

lenders.name: Felix
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good thing to do and if you do good things, good things will happen to you too.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: Much has been given to me in my life. This is a way that I can give a little back.

lenders.name: Tom and Kristen
lenders.loan_because: We strongly believe in helping those who help themselves.  The borrowers at Kiva have proven that they are attempting to better their lives and we'd love to do anything we can to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband is a tank commander in the United States Army.  I'm a stay at home mommy going back to school for an education major.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help governments and others solve hard problems in a socially responsible way that benefits all of the parties involved

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I want to help fight poverty.

lenders.name: Desmond
lenders.loan_because: because i can

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I want to help small businesses grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer/editor that helps people work with computers.

lenders.name: scott
lenders.loan_because: It is better to give than to receive.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I feel the need to recognize the responsibility I have been granted through my North American lifestyle.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a registerd nurse. I suppose I would describe it as a job with many blessings. I have the oppertunity to see people at their best and worst. At times, being a nurse grants me the privilege of seeing past the veils and illusions of people's lives.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: God blesses us so we can bless others. Remember, you can't outgive God!!

lenders.name: Vang
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Hehe...Ok, so I like helping out.  I think I've been fortunate and would like to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix big computers.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: We are all one in spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the operations and maintenance of  a Park System in a City in Washington State.

lenders.name: Ion Yadigaroglu
lenders.loan_because: Fantastic way to help reduce poverty in sharing a small bit of our prosperity with others
lenders.occupational_info: Invest in companies that create high returns and also benefit the greater good.

lenders.name: Jeanine
lenders.loan_because: I was looking for a way to make a real change this Lenten seasons.  I know there are many charities in the world, but here I can make an honest difference to one family who in turn can change the course of their community.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I'm Networking with a group of people to make one site very popular s career out of it

lenders.name: A. Brunetti Foundation
lenders.loan_because: Argentina Brunetti's final wish to help needy children around the world thru the proceeds of her final novel, "In Sicilian Company"
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others who assist poor children around the world

lenders.name: Andreas
lenders.loan_because: It supports entrepreneurship and I believe Microlending has the ability to improve the living conditions of large numbers of people throughout this world.
lenders.occupational_info: IT Project Manager

lenders.name: Simone
lenders.loan_because: I want to
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student, with two friends we have created a compnay working in information technology.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: Because I can do it and want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Advertising & Events for corporations.

lenders.name: Josquin
lenders.loan_because: Lost of small acts can change the world

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune by lending a hand "up" to someone else who has dreams to fulfill.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping promote safe and healthy workplaces to prevent injury and illness to workers.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to reach her/his goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate programs for newly arriving refugees from all over the world who come to Massachusetts looking for a better life for them and their children.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I love

lenders.name: Nico
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: it's so easy and it makes such a remarkable difference.

lenders.name: christopher
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of micro loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on an ambulance treating the sick and injured and transporting them to the hospital.

lenders.name: St. John YG
lenders.loan_because: we want to be more like Jesus and KIVA gives us that opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: We are just a group of kids that go to school, participate in almost every activity, and love spending time together as fellow disciples of Christ.

lenders.name: Marian & Nicole
lenders.loan_because: We are excited to have the opportunity to help those who want to help themselves and their families.

lenders.name: sheri
lenders.loan_because: We are two grade 8 classes in Victoria, British Columbia, Canada.  We loan because we hope someone will give us a break when we need it!

lenders.name: Nina L.
lenders.loan_because: I loan to people like my parents - hard working, supporting a family, being a role model for others -  a force for good in the community.

lenders.name: TOBY
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: disabled

lenders.name: Levi
lenders.loan_because: I have the means to, and I believe that it is the responsibility of those with much to help to those with little.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Business and Economics student at the University of Tulsa in Oklahoma.  I work for a car rental business. I am a member of the US Army National Guard and an Operation Iraqi Freedom veteran.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I see empowering women to be entrepreneurs as the way to change the world.  My dream is for women all over the world to be in control of their finances and decisions for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps people experience the natural world of the United States. My work is to create programs that build strong community relationships with local non-profit or other community groups to work together to help people explore the outdoors in the United States. Places like Yellowstone National Park or a local community park. I try to help people see a connection between their urban life and the natural world.

lenders.name: Tanja
lenders.loan_because: I believe that only sharing will make this world a better place for everybody.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others accomplish their goals.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: In helping others I help myself. We are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed with diginity. This is a great way to give a 'hand-up'.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher,who now spends as much time as possible travelling. Our travels have given us much joy because of the  friendly people we meet.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I have grown up in these settings, and it is great to see someone take a step to advance their life. I would like to support that

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people use the library and its resources.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I don't believe in charity

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: My small loan can make a huge difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software for a mobile messaging telecom company.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help.

lenders.name: Janey
lenders.loan_because: I like being able to help people help themselves - everyone has to start somewhere
lenders.occupational_info: Australian lawyer, living and working in Paris.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: how could you not?

lenders.name: betty
lenders.loan_because: I am amazed at how hard people work around the world and earn so little.
lenders.occupational_info: Nurses work very hard here but we are paid very well.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.occupational_info: Internet

lenders.name: Gigi
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the best way to fight poverty

lenders.name: Jodie
lenders.loan_because:
A friend once gave me $100 at the most difficult time of my life, which helped me immensely, not only in the physical sense, but in the spiritual sense as well.

A small amount can go a long way, and mean so much to the recipient!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with experimental treatments for people with cystic fibrosis.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: I wish to improve somebody's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I do well in school but I feel as though I'm not using my life enough to improve others' lives.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said "Love your neighbor as yourself"
lenders.occupational_info: I design industrial buildings so people have a place to work.

lenders.name: Rex
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed with a comfortable existence and I like to help others.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: There is no question that it is the right thing to do. I love to travel, and am always struck by the diversity of people and places, wealth and poverty, and goodness and bad that make up this world.That's why it's important to do all the good you can.
lenders.occupational_info: Got laid off from work, and felt lost at first, but then thought of how hard the folks we lend to have to work at keeping their lives going. Will still lend and hope it all works out.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It's a really good idea. Oh man.

lenders.name: Cheryl & Eric
lenders.loan_because: I can. "Pay it forward".

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am-a reluctant enthusiast... a part time crusader, a half-hearted fanatic.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help others who are also striving to be successfully self-employed.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because:
I love the Kiva concept! I hope it grows and grows.
My goal is to sponsor as many people as I can then  
keep returning the loan repayments to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Graphic designer, artist, falconer, musician.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: We are all living on the same planet and people living in the developing world deserve a chance to empower themselves. Lending to businesses helps build communities and improve living standards which in turn goes a long way towards fighting poverty.

lenders.name: Delphine & Jocelyn
lenders.loan_because: politician and corporation are no longer able to support good causes, only individuals can change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Promoting internet as a new place for peer-to-peer interaction

lenders.name: Ealex
lenders.loan_because:
There are people around the world far worse off than I am, and I believe that the world would be a better place if each of us would give a little of what we make to other people so that maybe they or their children may be able to do the same for other less fortunate people in their turn.

giants will fall.
lenders.occupational_info: Boring maybe, technical, maybe getting paid more than I actually deserve sometimes. Definitely makes me feel humble compared to someone who claws diamonds out of a mine or hauls tens of kilograms of rock for miles day by day.

lenders.name: Patrice
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to make as much of a difference as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to law school.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I finally paid off my student loans, and now with a greatful heart, I give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse practitioner in a cardiology group in Colorado. It is challenging but rewarding, and my hope is to make a difference in a patients life during a critical time.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: The world can be better than it currently is and this is a way of attempting to help.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: endless.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to shake that invisible hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Top-secret.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need, and money that I would otherwise spend on luxuries can make a huge difference in someone else's life. This is an amazing way to get money to those who need it to improve their situations and have the drive and the desire to succeed.

lenders.name: David & Megan
lenders.loan_because: We love to be able to see the direct results our contributions.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Nathanael
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate in life so far.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It's encouraging to see something good happening and to see people making a life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: It makes me happy to play music and it is fun to see people listening, dancing, and enjoying themselves.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I know many people need a little help, and I have some money to spare.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on NASA astronomical and weather satellites.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is the most effective means to help.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It's an incredible opportunity to be able to make a difference in someone's life in such a direct way.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: Credit provides dignity and hope for a better future for everyone.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It's nice.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and do things on television.

lenders.name: Gene
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet startups.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: With a small amount of my money combined with that of others, I can make a huge difference in someone's life and in a local economy half a world away.
lenders.occupational_info: I record financial transactions and analyze financial status for client companies.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I have the extra money.  It's also fun to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Very satisfying to help children learn.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: it is a small thing to do, with such a big impact on the lives of others.  How could I not?
lenders.occupational_info: Work with businesses and NGOs to develop their people skills and do Strategic Planning; teach sustainable decision making and building sustainable communities at two Canadian universities....and I paint the beauty of the wilderness.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: I know these entrepreneurs can put my money to better use than me buying another cup of coffee every morning.

lenders.name: Eric and Janess
lenders.loan_because: It empowers people to improve their own lives.

lenders.name: Gernot
lenders.loan_because: The KIVA concept is better than developmental aid given from government to government. Too often that money leaks away through corrupt government officials or  winds up in military spending or the Swiss bank accounts of a dictator. Governments can only do so much to reduce poverty. It is the ordinary people who need to take matters into their own hands.

lenders.name: Bolo
lenders.loan_because: Depuis toujours je cherche à inverstir directement à la source, aidé les entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Je suis Responsable Manager dans une Start up en Martinique

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women like myself.

lenders.name: Lilly's Nonnie
lenders.loan_because:
Because I can.
And the repayments will (eventually) go to sending Lilly to college.

lenders.name: Gina, Marty & Taye
lenders.loan_because: It's an important value of mine to help those in need when you can because you never know when you might need help yourself.  I want to teach my son that every gesture, no matter how small, counts.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed by God to be able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work within businesses to structure and organize IT to enable them to be successful.

lenders.name: Mel
lenders.loan_because: 1) It's the right thing to do and 2) It empowers individuals to support themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide support and assistance to people in my company to create a positive work environment.

lenders.name: tangel
lenders.loan_because: It's fun and potentially helpful!
lenders.occupational_info: I primarily work for a large US-based financial services company.

lenders.name: Adrienne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that by lending manageable loans  directly to women, whole communities benefit because women are often the most consistent providers to their children (if they have any), and the other members of their family. When a woman has the luxury to provide for herself, there's always a benefit to the larger community.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the president and founder of the Blue Nile Lotuses, Inc., and a part of our mission is to provide access to arts, technology, education, health and opportunities to working-poor women and girls.

lenders.name: Adam and Jenn
lenders.loan_because: We all need to give back in some way

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Investing in people's lives- why not? At least the government doesn't tax the dividends from that (yet).

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part in helping other people...and making this world a better place.

lenders.name: Jason Jody Alice Lyndon
lenders.loan_because: Got a penny? Leave a penny. Need a penny? Take a penny.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: When so little can make such a huge difference in someone's life, how can you not.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people create the best living and working conditions so that they may prosper, be healthy, and live with joy.

lenders.name: May & Paal
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the right thing to do, and it is an easy way to help other people.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I send e-mails to customers of a local grocery chain.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Homo sum: humani nil a me alienum puto

lenders.name: Jasmine
lenders.loan_because: Having been poor a good portion of my life, working hard to support a family, I am acutely aware of the huge difference a small amount of money can make. I've gotten many $25 loans in my life and now that I have the ability, it's time for me to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer. I teach machines to do human tasks so they can be automated, allowing people to focus on things that really make a difference, like making small loans :)

lenders.name: The Cousins
lenders.loan_because: I want my nieces and nephews to understand that it doesn't take a lot to make a difference in someone else's life. Each gets $25 on their birthday to make a loan.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work with complex quantitative models of international security.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: Kiva puts a face to a cause.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I can, and it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help people who have not the chance to live like I do.
For a better world...

lenders.name: Haylee
lenders.loan_because: I understand what a difference it makes having someone support your dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a full-time business student and I also work full-time as a retail manager.

lenders.name: Shehryar
lenders.loan_because: our lives are inter-linked on this tiny planet. Everyone deserves an opportunity to realise their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, manage and evaluate socio-economic development projects and policies.

lenders.name: Harold
lenders.loan_because: My daughter suggested it and I agreed it was very worth while

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: it's a great idea, and I'm really excited about it.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about small companies for people who might be interested in investing in them.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurial vision should not be deterred because of a lack of start-up. The success of a small business on any level inspires me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the co-founder and Managing Director of Staffing for Attack! Marketing and Promotions, a leading non-tradition marketing agency in the United States.  I am responsible for the daily operations within our Staffing and Recruiting department.

lenders.name: Jean-Pierre & Isabelle
lenders.loan_because: Small help from our end can have a great impact locally. We need to help each other while we are on this small and beautiful ball circling around the sun

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Though some may consider my paychecks to be rather pathetic, I know it might mean the world to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student studying Art History with a concentration in conservation and preservation. Basically, I hope to have a career preserving our past for future generations to learn from and enjoy.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity.

lenders.name: Kurt & Steph
lenders.loan_because: Our friends gave us an initial loan for a wedding gift.  We have been fortunate to be able to travel to Africa.  Kiva is a great way to help, and know our money is going straight to those that will put it to good use.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a consulting firm that works mostly with government agencies.  We monitor water quality and devices and systems that improve surface water - hoping to improve drinking water quality and aquatic habitat.  I hope someday that I can volunteer somewhere in Africa and use my skills in water quality to help out.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: Someone helped me one time - and it worked!

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I think micorcredit is a way for people to  make real improvements in their qualities of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Mary Washington in Fredericksburg, Virginia, in the United States. I'm studying Political Science and Religion and I'm going to join the Peace Corps after I graduate.

lenders.name: Meg
lenders.loan_because: anyone who has a little bit extra should give to those who have barely enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Community PhoneBook in my town, which lists all of the local businesses in our area so that they are easily accessible to the community.

lenders.name: Kevin Cocco
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and respect the Kiva Microloan model.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer Science

lenders.loan_because: I believe this may be a better idea.

lenders.name: Rocky

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: what seems a small amount to me can make a big difference for someone else ......

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.personal_url: I don't have one setup yet
lenders.loan_because: I truly understand the struggle to get out of poverty.  I admire those who try and do their best in spite of all the obstacles.  I don't have much, but want to share what I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired school teacher on disability.  I taught for 24 years, 23 of them in sixth grade.  I taught math, science, and some language arts.  I loved it and hated to leave.  My income was decreased drastically and I have been trying to find a job I can do from home so that my disability will interfere minimally.  I am taking courses online to become a medical transcriptionist.

lenders.name: Marc Perry
lenders.loan_because: pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: psychology, human and social services

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: There are places that my $25 can go so much further than here.

lenders.name: Candy
lenders.loan_because: "Helping others is the greatest of life's accomplishments."  "The path to enlightment is through kindheartedness." ~ Dalai Lama
lenders.occupational_info: I am priviledged to have the opportunity to help others.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because:
Give women credit, and they will change the world.

I believe people who have greater economic independence also have better control over their and their family's health and prosperity.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: What better way to serve our fellow man around the world.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: This was a gift given to me by my new step daughter. It is a wonderful feeling to be able to give some one a new start. I thank my Step daughter for sharing this great feeling with me. To help others,I Love that.The Gift of Giving.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a Fireman. I work in a big city.
I Love my Job.

lenders.name: Angelique
lenders.loan_because: I understand that microloans go a long way to improving the lives of the recipients.  A small amount of money from me can have a big impact.

lenders.name: Nilson
lenders.loan_because: I want to aid people to go forward and aim a better life and world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an engineer. I deal with management of industrial projects.

lenders.name: Matt

I have seen how the small business owner
can transform her life and those around her. I want to help her to realize her dreams.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an expert in network technologies - the "plumbing" that the Internet runs on.

lenders.name: Corey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair computers and televisions.

lenders.name: Claudio
lenders.loan_because:
It's beautiful to dream to be successful in life and why not help other so they can help them self. Spread the wealth with love, integrity and generosity. 
Good luck!
lenders.occupational_info:
I always concentrate on the out come then on how to accomplish the work. It's a vision, a moment of inspiration that will give you an insight of who you are being in regard to your business.
Always keep your integrity intact. Because this is who you are to others.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky to have enough money to share it with others; I also feel loaning is a support to proactive initiatives and not just charity.

lenders.name: RaviS
lenders.loan_because: We want to see if the loan can make a difference to somebody across the world in a positive way....

lenders.name: MarkCōs
lenders.loan_because: we are all interdependent.  I want to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business consultant with over twenty years of experience in strategic leadership, customer-centric sales and consulting, business operations, and working with executives to build a productive culture. I strive daily to practice the principles of Lifelong Wellness, defining my life one choice at a time and feeding my body, mind, and spirit a balanced diet, healthy exercise, rewarding work, good music, and supportive relationships.

lenders.name: Bobbi
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower women, especially in 3rd world countries.   I feel GREAT about making this small difference.
lenders.occupational_info: When a Kiva loan is paid off, I re-loan it and add another Kiva loan making a little Kiva loan  pyramid.    For once, a pyramid scheme that benefits others!

lenders.name: Kurt Roar
lenders.loan_because: Because I think this is a good way of helping people help themself, and for them to build selfconfidence through providing food on the table for they're family. Microcredit is a system I think can make a real difference in peoples lives.

lenders.name: Julia Gail & Gary
lenders.loan_because: Just trying to make things better
lenders.occupational_info: In my professional life, I helped people use computers to solve problems.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I know that the smallest of things make the biggest difference; it only takes a small gesture to change the world. It truly feels wonderful to reach out to others in need.

lenders.name: Stevana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women who haven't been as fortunate as I have been to grow up with so much opportunity.

lenders.loan_because: I am blessed.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those that want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend most of my time using a computer, designing and writing software applications.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
I heard about the man who started this organization.  I had no idea I could personally help until I notice an advertisement on U-Tube.  I nearly cried for joy to know I can help others like this.  I am pleased to help.

***  BY the way...  The picture of me is in Russia, not at my home.  ***
lenders.occupational_info: I am the president of a corporation.  I sell electronic locks on the Internet.

lenders.name: Newhaven Projects
lenders.loan_because:
We all chipped in at work - spare change, soda cans and bottle refund money - into our penny jar. We loan because a loan is more productive than charity by itself, and most of us have come from diverse ethnic backgrounds and know how lucky we have it here in Canada.

Since May 2006, our first loan has been paid back and we reinvested the money to another lender. We've also collected enough pennies to provide a third loan.
lenders.occupational_info: building construction

lenders.name: favorsnbridal.com
lenders.loan_because: Many taught and supported me when I started my small business in 1986.   Now it is my turn to extend a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: My online store favorsnbridal.com markets bridal items such as wedding invitations, favors, cake tops, garters, toasting glasses, and more.   It also markets baby favors and gifts.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women in the world community.

lenders.name: The Brights
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to provide capital to help others build their own businesses.

lenders.name: Rasmus
lenders.loan_because: Its a smart way of helping people in need, as the money can be reinvested.
lenders.occupational_info: I have just started as a salesman at a local Hi-fi store.

lenders.name: Bhanu N Bindu
lenders.loan_because: we believe that a lot of people have the intelligence to be successful but don't get the right oppurtunity. This is a very small step towards provide such an opportunity.

lenders.name: World Interest Club
lenders.loan_because: We are a Model United Nations Team.  Through micro loans we can not only create a learning environment among the participants, but can also take action concurrent with what we preach while simultaneously making a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are constantly ranked as one of the top 5 High School Model UN teams within the country.  This year, winning Outstanding Large Delegation at the most prestigious conference in the nation, Harvard MUN, we are on pace for our best year yet.

lenders.name: Paxton
lenders.loan_because: Because as a family we want to help other families in need
lenders.occupational_info: Elizabeth is a  nurse manager at a children's hospital and Darryl is a gardner at the zoo.  We have 3 girls, ages 9, 11, 13.

lenders.name: The Mazishers
lenders.loan_because: we like to help out

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Vinson
lenders.loan_because: We are the richest country in the world, here in the USA. It is essential that we help out those less fortunate, to be as useful as possible during our short stay on this planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a jazz musician (drummer/composer), living and working in New York City.

lenders.name: Aftershock
lenders.loan_because: It works. We're all global citizens, and this is one good way to make it count.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn how to use their computers more effectively and solve problems.

lenders.name: farah
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to be self-sustaining.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a masters student in public health. God willing, i hope to become a physician one day and concentrate on women's health and social justice.

lenders.name: tien
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should. I hope my small contribution will lessen someone's suffering, if just by a little bit

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I need to share the abundance I have with others who have less.
lenders.occupational_info: I make a living by what I get. I make a life by what I give.

lenders.name: Yutakasa Guides
lenders.loan_because: We recognize the importance of sharing abundance, one person at a time, and hope to create ripples in the world by doing just that.
lenders.occupational_info: Yutakasa = abundance.We get together once a month for discussions on sufficency and abundance and what we can do as individuals to help others. Each participant brings an item from his/her belongings, and at the end of the program, we have an auction. Our last action of the day is to search for someone to loan the proceeds to here at Kiva.

lenders.name: Roberto
lenders.loan_because: In a small way I would like to help people who provide local services to make their communities better places.
lenders.occupational_info: Ideas to improve real estate management business

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I've been to third world countries and desire to do something tangible to help.

lenders.name: nat kausik
lenders.loan_because: access to capital can change lives.
lenders.occupational_info: dad, entrepreneur

lenders.name: BSHD1-11
lenders.loan_because: We did a class presentation on Kiva and asked everyone to join in--they did. What a joy to be able to help others in some small way!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a cohort of adult learners working our way toward Bachelors Degrees in Human Development. The name of our school is Warner Pacific College.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: cosmetics mfgr

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It's good to do.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Even if many of us lenders don't have the ability to give that much, I think it's great that once we combine our efforts we can make a big impact.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I have the money and I'm not using all of it for my own projects, so I might as well invest it in yours.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in the ideas I work on. I teach, talk, and write about the projects I am involved in producing.  Hopefully, they will make the world a slightly better place.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because:
I am lucky to live in the United States, with all the freedom and  resources this country provides. I've received helping hands throughout my life, and this is a chance to help others--particularly women--who really need it. 

Also, I want to teach my son Tony about how fortunate he is and how he can make a difference. I hope to get him started in charitable giving by seeing the faces of those he can help. It's a way to teach him about other places and people.

The best way to help people is through funding that helps them get on their feet and maintains their dignity. Kiva does just that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an editor at Solution Tree, an educational publishing firm.

lenders.name: Holley
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher and also work in public policy in state and local government taxation and budgeting.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: Every bit counts, and there's so much need out there. And also...helping people feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student and a science teacher.

lenders.name: Ian Scott Field
lenders.loan_because: Because we become more interconnected every day.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software that helps medical laboratories operate more effectively.

lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.loan_because: helping people help themselves is awesome.

lenders.name: harley
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Bringing happiness to my family.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because:
I'm 23 years old, I'm an aesthetician student, my dream is to become the better in this branch in the world.
To begin, I'll like to open a great salon and sell American black women's products in my country. Products are too much expensive in my country and people does'nt work well. I want every women to be able to buy good products. And I'll be able to help 2 or 3 young girl by giving them a job in my salon. It's too difficult for us but very important to be independent.
lenders.occupational_info: aesthetician and hair stylist

lenders.name: Sucheep
lenders.loan_because: I have to renovate an improvement our product and shoroom ,if we can we want to sell it for 100,000 USD,or make a lending by 1-2 years for payback money with good interest 10-15%
lenders.occupational_info: we have 3 showrooms in dowtown of bangkok ,our biz is about home deration item such as ceramic vase ,tableware , gift

lenders.name: Jabran & Meher
lenders.loan_because: I should.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: to whom much is given much should be returned

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.occupational_info: American 40 years in Scandinavia, where it is no big deal to help others.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help entrepreneurs get their businesses off the ground.
lenders.occupational_info: I create health care publications for health organizations.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I feel blessed and I enjoy returning the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a school in Seattle Washington USA that teaches around 450 students. Our students range in ages from 12 to 18. I make sure the computers that the students and teachers use run smoothly.

lenders.name: Vijay
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurial spirit / capacity / self-help.
lenders.occupational_info: I study and support business practices aimed at alleviating poverty, promoting sustainability and better healthcare.

lenders.name: Mahfez Enterprises
lenders.loan_because: We know how hard it is to start up a business, may it be big or small, with no money. So, we're just passing forward what we are able to share with other IBO's like us! Hopefully it will strike a positive chain reaction!
lenders.occupational_info: E-commerce / online business.

lenders.name: Firoz (Freeman)
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because Kiva.org is performing a great, good and godly function. 
Being an entrepreneur with social conscious I have been thinking of similar idea but now having found you as such would like to support you and not like to reinvent. 
I believe in assisting people to become entrepreneurs where ever they are. Well done to the team at Kiva.org. Keep up the good work. 
God bless you all.
lenders.occupational_info:
As Social Entrepreneurs we believe that small capital ( we call it social hybrid and courageous dollars) is the solution to assist people and create entrepreneurs. I am in the forefront with my own family capital. We have allocated personal wealth of $ 1 million to participants that apply for loan through www.kiva.org website. 
To encourage kiva cause further I will also consider underwriting loans of other lenders to small entrepreneurs and welcome guidance from like minded professionals.

Apart from small capital, people need mentoring, as such I will consider recruiting and creating team consisting of senior retired executives to mentor Borrowers/entrepreneurs to guide them to grow their businesses. In this connection I welcome retired professionals to join and help me in this to assist people through noble cause of kiva.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small changes can make big differences in the world.  This is an easy way to "go global".
lenders.occupational_info: I help to prepare income tax returns for a large company.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I read Muhammad Yunus' book on the Grameen Bank, and I think this is the most brilliant idea I've ever heard.
lenders.occupational_info: I am looking for work as a nurse.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: There are people with dreams and asperations that I can help. I just imagine myself in their shoes and how much joy I would feel when I was granted my loan. I really hope my small contribution will make a big difference.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I live in a country that wastes energy and resources as if no one else needed them.  Lending to individuals is a way to put resources where they can make a real difference while bypassing the corruption of the middlemen along the way.  Everyone should do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach earth science, astronomy and physics to students between 14 and 18 years of age.

lenders.name: Zack
lenders.loan_because: We are very lucky and have so much. I hope I can make a difference in someone else's life who is less fortunate than me.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I'm a full-time college student at Douglas College.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to live in the United States and to have the opportunities we have here.  It is a pleasure to help people with less advantages, who are working hard, to improve their situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I run equipment (backhoes, cranes, etc) used in the construction of electrical powerlines and substations.  Lately much of my work is being done on windfarms.

lenders.name: Dorisamu
lenders.loan_because: i loan because i want to set up a fish seed production hatchery here in Nigeria
lenders.occupational_info: it produce fish for human consumption

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: DOING MY PART
lenders.occupational_info: I am a seaman by trade.  I go to sea in small very noisy tugboats for weeks at a time.  it is a world of hours of bordom and the occasional very high risk and stress

lenders.name: Peri
lenders.loan_because: it's a joy to know that the money that would be sitting in my bank is benefiting someone across the world.  And when it is paid back and I relend, I have the pleasure all over again.  I can only hope these loans bring the recipients similar joy and that they are better able to provide for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that need economic help, so that there familys can have a great life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Student and am in 7th grade. I live in the United States. I love horses, goats, basically all animals.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I believe that capitalism has done more to feed people and lengthen life spans than any other idea in history
lenders.occupational_info: My company lends people money so that they can buy homes

lenders.name: Elina
lenders.loan_because: It really makes me feel better about myself, knowing that I am doing something to help those less fortunate than me.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: it helps the little I've got to spare go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in school to become a lawyer and I am also a law clerk at a consumer protection law firm.

lenders.name: B-ster
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the truth of, "Be the change you want to see in the world."

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-lending, and this is an exciting way to do it directly
lenders.occupational_info: I manage and keep track of the assets and debts for new companies, and I make financial reports for the investors

lenders.name: Tommy
lenders.loan_because:
I was on tour for 25 years. From the very famous to the infamous. I got rich from my gift. My art took  very good care of me. 
I stayed at the Ritz. I dated models. I thought of 
no-one but me and had a 
great time doing it. 
I spent 5 years playing keyboards for the Backstreet Boys. 
We went to Indonesia and I was stunned into silence. 
I had no idea people lived like that. 
Words can't describe. 
I give because I have been blessed and to not give would be a crime.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a piano player, a vocalist, and an idiot. 
My audience likes me that way. 
The folks here that we lend to are the real heros.
They scrape and struggle. 
They provide and parent. 
Don't ask about me. 
I'm just Words on a Shirt.

lenders.name: Niki & Karina
lenders.loan_because: We need to be the change we want to see in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: Public servant and both life long students who want to share our good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because: I can and I choose to. I do not hesitate to help anyone if I can in my daily life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Freshmen as Colorado State University and I also work at one of the dining halls at the school.

lenders.name: David Hauslaib
lenders.loan_because: it's one way of giving back. I'm a big believer in the power of micro-lending.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an Internet company

lenders.name: Sherrie
lenders.loan_because:
I love being able to help people achieve their dreams.

What lies behind us and what lies before us are small matters compared to what lies within us....and when we bring what is within out, MIRACLES HAPPEN!
-Emerson
lenders.occupational_info: I am employed as an office manager and I also have my own part-time business reselling goods.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a full-time nursing student at the UIC Urbana program.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I believe micro-credit makes a huge difference and Kiva makes it so easy.

lenders.name: Val & Lou
lenders.loan_because: We are happy to help out in any way we can.

lenders.name: Violet and Finn
lenders.occupational_info:
Conor: Air National Guard
Sarah: Mama
Violet and Finn: Learners

lenders.name: quentin
lenders.occupational_info: rumple

lenders.name: Ernie, Eva, & Dante
lenders.occupation: Economic Analyst, Web Master, and Baby
lenders.loan_because: we believe deeply in helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
Ernie is an economic analyst for the City and County of San Francisco, California.

Eva is the webmaster for the College of Natural Resources, University of California, Berkeley.

Dante just turned 13 months old. He spends his day eating, sleeping, and playing. His is the hardest work of all!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a transportation planner.

lenders.name: Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I'm curious how microfinance works.
lenders.occupational_info: i fix it

lenders.name: H Okano
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the longest journey begins with a single step. I hope we make change our lives. Both you and me.

lenders.name: Kiva Fund. Group,S/L
lenders.loan_because:
*We Are A Fund raising Group In Secondlife.com, A Web Based Virtual World/Chat Game.
*Search for Kiva.Org  Fundraising Group.*
lenders.occupational_info: Virtual People Called Avatars Raise Virtual Money Called Lindens(L$) In A Web World.                    Exchanged Into Real Money(US$),That is Loaned To Real People In The Real World. Is That Awesome Or What?

lenders.name: Sarah/Rebecca/family
lenders.loan_because: we want to teach our children that they can and should help others, and that we are all part of this big, wonderful world.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: The loans aid in the creation and growth of successful businesses, which create jobs and stimulate competition for better products and new ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: I am lead test engineer for a website.

lenders.name: Brandice
lenders.loan_because: Having struggled financially on my own, I'm happy to make enough money to give it to someone who needs the help that I've been given when I was in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am clinical psychiatric social worker (LISW) and a writer. I'm passionate about both my creative work and my work as a mental health professional.

lenders.name: Jocelyn
lenders.loan_because: I dream of a better world so i try

lenders.name: Elisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world by helping someone succeed.

lenders.name: athooks
lenders.loan_because: What goes around...comes around.
lenders.occupational_info: I specialize in getting small business noticed on the world wide web through link visibility, paid search advertising and search engine optimization. My clients are all in different stages of their careers, so helping them find their niche on the internet is rewarding.

lenders.name: Miles
lenders.loan_because: this is a way to share the blessings that God has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a team of engineers who work for a major aerospace company.

lenders.name: Harris
lenders.loan_because: I am able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: In school to become a science professor at university.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: The world needs to be a better place.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: As Bono said when he accepted the 2007 Man of the Year Award from the NAACP, "God's heart is toward the poor, ours should also be so."
lenders.occupational_info: I help leaders enhance their positive impact by working with them to increase their trustworthiness

lenders.name: Vid & Keala
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to teach my kids Keala and Keoni the joy and responsibility of empowering others around the world just as others have done for us in the outer islands of Micronesia.
lenders.occupational_info: Micronesian web designer, international educator, and a social entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to have people invest in my dreams, I want to be able to return the favor.

lenders.name: Nannette
lenders.occupation: Business Owner - Flower Shop Puerto Rico
lenders.loan_because: I started my business on a loan. As all new businesses I went through my bad times...now it is time to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work a flower shop and gift basket business.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blesed in my life and I want to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a factory as an operator of a machine that makes pouches of food for people who are being tube fed due to illness.

lenders.name: Muriel
lenders.loan_because: It is a good investment in people, women in particular. It provides hope. Besides, sharing is good, and my farmer dad was my best role model. This honors him and his memory.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher, writer, farmer's daughter.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: Rishi
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to foster entrepreneurship among the passionate and driven people.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference for others in my own small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur

lenders.name: Max
lenders.occupational_info: Student at college studying economics and electrical engineering

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.occupational_info: consultant

lenders.name: Jim & Paula
lenders.loan_because: People need to have a helping hand to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We currently work as teachers in SW Wyoming

lenders.name: Summer Kumar
lenders.loan_because: I relied on loans so that I could go to college, so I know how important loans are in giving people a head start.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about art and literature for magazines and newspapers in the U.S.

lenders.name: Sue Ann
lenders.loan_because: this seems like a good way to shake someone's hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange healthcare services for the elderly and the disabled.  I am also a poet and the editor of a poetry journal, 10x3 plus.  The painting I've included here was done by Spanish artist, Dan Casado.

lenders.name: TacoMan2000
lenders.loan_because: I want tacos to be cheaper.
lenders.occupational_info: Moose.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I'm curious

lenders.name: Dagny
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving a hand up not a hand out and that's what Kiva is.  Nearly every American could give - excuse me - LOAN someone $25.  Just imagine if we all did - or more!
lenders.occupational_info: I advise Hi-Tech companies in their growth phase and help manage their staffing effort

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: offsetting inequity is possible. i would like to contribute to better world and kiva helps me do that.

lenders.name: Don & Dahlia (the dog)
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the spirt of the human race.  That the solution to world crisis is unity and cooperation.  The key to destroying poverty is through education.  People should have the opportunity to improve themselves by providing and contributing to their community and family.  Give a person a fish and the will eat dinner, teach a person to fish they will eat for life.  The beauty of this concept is the "pay it forward".  Instead of removing the interest from the repayed loan, you use it to finance another business in a different region.  The result is the original borrow is given the opportunity to assist another business.  It is a beautiful plan.
lenders.occupational_info: My work consist of translation and interpetation of foreign documents and international event.

lenders.name: Dan & Mary
lenders.loan_because: we travel around the world quite a bit and want an effective way to play a small role in improving poverty and economic inefficiencies that we see

lenders.name: Carter
lenders.occupation: Director of Finance & Operations at CleanFish
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to have a chance to live their lives free from poverty.

lenders.name: Svein Harald
lenders.loan_because: I like to think of what the loans helps make happen - started with a beach hut at Samoa and a car repair shop in Azerbaijan. Will go there and have a look;-)

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: Giving connects you with your spirit.

lenders.name: Thor
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a materials engineer, develop and improve plastic materials for various uses from baby diapers to agricultural films.

lenders.name: MARY LOUISE
lenders.loan_because: It is something I can afford to do that will help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for a not-for-profit faith-based community services agency.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I admire and respect entrepreneurs in difficult circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing Consultant. Author.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I use to live in a 3rd world country and am saddened by all the people I never helped. I want to change that now.
lenders.occupational_info: Making websites for the internet

lenders.name: R.J. and Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Empowering others to become self-sufficient is the answer.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because:
The Lord has provided us (human kind) with plenty of food, water, and the potential for all to prosper. All it takes is trust, generosity, and a lack of greed.

I want you and your family to prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: Linux/Unix Administrator

lenders.name: Barry
lenders.loan_because: I see this as a great opportunity to empower individuals.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do....helping others in ways that they then can help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Preparation of income tax returns and monthly accounting services.

lenders.name: Fredrik
lenders.loan_because: It's a cliché, but micro-loans really are a brilliant way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a free-lance creative producer for TV production companies. Basically, I fashion the content for each episode of whatever TV-show I'm currently working on.
